original_title: also the heart is a muscle
overview: Based on the real-life experiences of a friend, Antonio Vasaturoâ€™s striking 15-minute film follows a young man rebuilding his body after illness. As his obsession with his physique intensifies, he embarks on a new journey of discovery as an attraction to similar bodies arises. Told through a series of vignettes centred around its protagonist, also the heart is a muscle, is an experimental portrait of a complex, but relatable character.
tagline: fake story based on true events
title: also the heart is a muscle
